resource.name: IHE SDC/eCC on FHIR DiagnosticReport
resource.description: A DiagnosticReport Profile meant to capture what should be represented in a report parsed from an IHE SDC Form

resource.name: IHE SDC/eCC on FHIR DocumentReference
resource.description: A DocumentReference Profile meant to share an IHE SDC Form whether completed or blank

resource.name: IHE SDC/eCC on FHIR Observation
resource.description: A Observation Profile meant to capture Question and Answer Sets from an IHE SDC Form. Questions shold be added as a code and the answer should be added as an appropriate data type. If the answer is a single select it should be added as a valueCodeableConcept. If a Question is a Multiselect then component may be used to list multiple answers

resource.name: SDCeCCObservationCodeEx
resource.description: Example Observation using codes from SDC

resource.name: SDCeCCObservationTextEx
resource.description: Example Observation using text fill in from SDC
